org.onehippo.forge.utilities.hst.paging

Class IterablePagination<T extends org.hippoecm.hst.content.beans.standard.HippoBean>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.onehippo.forge.utilities.hst.paging.Pageable
      • org.onehippo.forge.utilities.hst.paging.IterablePagination<T>

  • public class IterablePagination<T extends org.hippoecm.hst.content.beans.standard.HippoBean>
extends Pageable
    IterablePagination: a Pageable with HippoBean items.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.onehippo.forge.utilities.hst.paging.Pageable

        DEFAULT_PAGE_NUMBER, DEFAULT_PAGE_SIZE, DEFAULT_VISIBLE_PAGES

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      IterablePagination(org.hippoecm.hst.content.beans.standard.HippoBeanIterator beans, int currentPage)
      Constructor to be used when the paging is not done beforehand (for example in HST query), but has to be done by this class, for instance paging on facet navigation results.
      IterablePagination(org.hippoecm.hst.content.beans.standard.HippoBeanIterator beans, int pageSize, int currentPage)
      Constructor to be used when the paging is not done beforehand (for example in HST query), but has to be done by this class, for instance paging on facet navigation results.

      Constructor to be used when the paging has been done beforehand (for example in HST query).

      Constructor to be used when the paging is not done beforehand (for example in HST query), but has to be done by this class, for instance paging on facet navigation results.
      IterablePagination(int totalSize, List<T> items)
      Constructor to be used when the paging has been done beforehand (for example in HST query).
      IterablePagination(List<T> items, int pageSize, int currentPage)
      Constructor to be used when the paging is not done beforehand (for example in HST query), but has to be done by this class, for instance paging on facet navigation results.

    • Constructor Detail

      • IterablePagination

        public IterablePagination(org.hippoecm.hst.content.beans.standard.HippoBeanIterator beans,
                          int totalSize,
                          int pageSize,
                          int currentPage)
        Constructor to be used when the paging has been done beforehand (for example in HST query). The beans iterator size should be the same as pageSize (except maybe for the last page). E.g. when HstQuery is used to get the beans, both HstQuery#setLimit and HstQuery#setOffset has been used.

      • IterablePagination

        public IterablePagination(int totalSize,
                          List<T> items)
        Constructor to be used when the paging has been done beforehand (for example in HST query).

      • IterablePagination

        public IterablePagination(org.hippoecm.hst.content.beans.standard.HippoBeanIterator beans,
                          int currentPage)
        Constructor to be used when the paging is not done beforehand (for example in HST query), but has to be done by this class, for instance paging on facet navigation results.

      • IterablePagination

        public IterablePagination(org.hippoecm.hst.content.beans.standard.HippoBeanIterator beans,
                          int pageSize,
                          int currentPage)
        Constructor to be used when the paging is not done beforehand (for example in HST query), but has to be done by this class, for instance paging on facet navigation results.

    • Method Detail

      • addItem

        public void addItem(T item)
        Add an item
        Parameters:
        item - the item

      • setDefaultPageRange

        public void setDefaultPageRange(int defaultPageRange)
        Set the default page range, i.e. the page range width, that will be used to determine the actual page range by subtracting the page fill (== half the default page range) from current page and adding the same fill to the current page.
        Parameters:
        defaultPageRange - value of default page range

      • getItems

        public List<? extends org.hippoecm.hst.content.beans.standard.HippoBean> getItems()
        Get all paged items
        Returns:
        all paged items

      • setItems

        public void setItems(List<? extends org.hippoecm.hst.content.beans.standard.HippoBean> items)

      • getPageRange

        public List<Long> getPageRange(int page)
        Default page range for given page
        Parameters:
        page - current page
        Returns:
        page surrounded by results on both side e.g. 1, 2, 3, 4<selected page>5, 6 ,7 ,8,9 etc.>
        See Also:
        getDefaultPageFill()

      • getCurrentRange

        public List<Long> getCurrentRange()
        Default Page range for current selected page, it is "google alike" page range with x pages before selected item and x+1 after selected item.
        Returns:
        range based on default fill 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 <selected 6>, 7, 8,9 etc.
        See Also:
        getDefaultPageFill()

      • getPageRangeWithFill

        public List<Long> getPageRangeWithFill(long page,
                                       int fillIn)
        Return previous X and next X pages for given page, based on total pages.
        Parameters:
        page - selected page
        fillIn - selected page
        Returns:
        page range for given page
